author: CNET
description:
In this episode of How To Do It All, learn how to easily create AI-generated videos using Sora by OpenAI. From downloading the app on iOS to crafting your own prompts and appearances, we cover everything you need to know to start making your own AI generated content today. Don't forget to subscribe for more tech tutorials.

0:00 Intro
0:31 Where to get Sora app
0:50 How to get access to Sora
1:15 App main feed and features
1:46 Creating your first video
2:56 Managing your videos
3:16 Using Sora on desktop
3:35 Outro
